p:
Homology models have been built relying on the website SwissModel.
15 Structural templates have been searched and validated using the software available within the SwissModel environment and HHPred.
16 Homology models have been validated using the QMEAN tool.
17 Three‐dimensional structures have been analyzed and displayed using PyMOL.
18 To map the structural variability of the N, E, S, and M regions of the virus and their sites under selection pressure, homology modeling has been applied to the sequence of 2019‐nCoV.
